ch0008_41_erika/0101_0701_02_10: I hope you have a wonderful day.
ch0008_41_erika/7101_0701_01_10:
Pasio’s filled with many different flowers. I keep
finding myself captivated by each new one
I discover!
ch0008_41_erika/7101_0701_02_10:
There could even be flowers here that don’t exist
anywhere else.
ch0008_41_erika/7101_0701_03_10: Would you like to join me on a search for some?
ch0008_41_erika/7102_0701_01_10: Jasmine is a Gym Leader from Johto.
ch0008_41_erika/7102_0701_02_10: She’s a friend of mine and is so charmingly honest.
ch0008_41_erika/7102_0701_03_10: That’s why I can’t help but tease her. Ehehe...
ch0008_41_erika/7103_0701_01_10:
Did you know every plant and flower has its own
meaning?
ch0008_41_erika/7103_0701_02_10: They can express gratitude, friendship, and more.
ch0008_41_erika/7103_0701_03_10:
Interesting, don’t you think? Doesn’t it make you
want to learn more about flowers?
ch0008_41_erika/7104_0701_01_10:
The sweet scent of Lurantis works like
an essential oil.
ch0008_41_erika/7104_0701_02_10: Taking a midday nap in it is so relaxing!
ch0008_41_erika/7105_0701_01_10:
Both Pokémon and flowers need love and care
to grow.
ch0008_41_erika/7105_0701_02_10:
Under your care, I’m sure flowers would bloom
beautifully, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0008_41_erika/7105_0701_03_10:
I can tell because I’ve seen how you care for
your Pokémon.
ch0008_41_erika/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! Here, I’d like you to have this.
ch0008_41_erika/2501_0701_01_10:
Lurantis are beautiful, but maintaining their beauty
requires a lot of effort.
ch0008_41_erika/2501_0701_02_10:
You need a sharp eye that notices even the
slightest changes.
ch0008_41_erika/2501_0701_03_10:
The more effort a Trainer puts in, the more a
Lurantis’s beauty will shine.
ch0008_41_erika/2501_0702_01_10:
I would never collect Pokémon if they were
unattractive.
ch0008_41_erika/2501_0702_02_10:
But if you care for every Pokémon with energy
and love, I believe all will shine beautifully.
ch0008_41_erika/2501_0702_03_10:
Pokémon are the same as flowers—how you raise
them is crucial.
ch0008_41_erika/2511_0701_01_10:
Mallow told me you can find a very large Lurantis
in the Alola region.
ch0008_41_erika/2511_0701_02_10: Apparently, if you cook a meal, it’ll come to you.
ch0008_41_erika/2511_0701_03_10:
Hearing that makes me want to visit and travel
around Alola!
ch0008_41_erika/2511_0702_01_10:
I heard you can meet a large Lurantis if you
participate in something called the
island challenge.
ch0008_41_erika/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder if I’d be able to join, even though I’m a
Gym Leader.
ch0008_41_erika/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s relax with some tea and sweets this morning
to warm ourselves up before we start our day.
ch0008_41_erika/3003_0701_01_10:
Zzz... Zzz... Oh, I’m sorry about that. I just had
lunch, and now I’m feeling sleepy...
ch0008_41_erika/3005_0701_01_10:
Stars look like twinkling flowers blooming in the
night sky, don’t you think?
